tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I came across Dr.Sanjeeva Reddy quite accidentally. My 13-day old son was suffering from Jaundice and his regular paediatrician was out of town. Someone suggested Dr.Sanjeeva Reddy(thank god for that!).
He diagnosed accurately and had my son admitted immediately. With personal interest and dedication, he cured my son soon. After that I never went back to my son's regular paediatrician. I find him warm, approachable and very committed.My son is now a 5 year old. In these 5 years, several times when he has suffered from cold, cough, fever, stomach problems, I just had to pick the phone and call this doctor. Every time he has received the calls and guided me.Never once has he ignored my call. Tell me, how many doctors will do that in this busy world that we are living in. I would absolutely recommend him to all!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is the pediatric for our new born. we have visited him routine check ups for the baby and vaccination almost every month. Being new parents, we have had lot of queries and concerns (sometimes the queries which our elders think is not even a point to talk) but I have always found him answering us with a smile along with a logical explanation. he always vaccinated our baby himself and not ask the nurse to do it, which I find as a great advantage. he observation skills are highly proficient with regards to the baby milestones achievement. surely, if not for him, we as parents would have been lost seeing so many new things in our first baby.

** ******** ** *** **** *** ****** **** * *****  My daughter admitted to Manipal hospital where this doctor was taking care. ***** * **** ** ********* *** **** ** **** **** ***** ** *****. He did 30 different type of tests and Finally advised for bone marrow testing .

They changed 3.2 laks but fevers has not come down so I taken discharge. Gone to different hospital.

This doctor only takeing money from people. Do not have any humanity.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sanjeeva Reddy has been my child's doctor since he was born and now for more than 5 years. He is very systematic with his approach, will provide meds, tests only when required.The treatment is always to the point and we never faced any difficulties.He explains the condition and diasgnosis very well.I am blessed to have a doctor like him for my child. He even picks up the call and provides meds whenever i have called in emergency if out of town or on Sundays.I would highly recommend him.
I have been consulting the doctor for almost 5 years for my kids. He is very quick in understanding the cause and does not prescribe unnecessary medicines.
By birth onwards my baby we are going to dr. Sanjeeva reddy . Every time I am feeling like my kid is in safe hand .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: **** ****** ************* he is the doctor who brought. Back my son******* ****** *** ********Very Friendly
